product_name: Baffin Ice Bear Winter Boots - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: An unbeatable combination of warmth, comfort and durability make the Baffin Ice Bear winter boots an obvious choice for all-day outings in very cold weather. Lightweight polyurethane uppers offer waterproof protection; built-in gaiters seal out harsh weather; nylon linings are comfortable with socks and aid moisture management. Polyurethane insulation adds reliable warmth without weighing you down; boots are comfort rated to -40degF. Rubber midsoles provide lasting support and cushioning. Baffin Ice Bear winter boots feature flexible yet durable rubber outsoles for comfortable walking and excellent traction over ice and snow. Closeout.
short_description: An unbeatable combination of warmth, comfort and durability make the Baffin Ice Bear winter boots an obvious choice for all-day outings in very cold weather.
